acceptOwner().details: Can only be called by the pending owner to ensure correctness

setPendingOwner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner      New owner does not take affect until that address calls `acceptOwner()`

acceptOwner().notice: Accepts and transfers the ownership of the contract to the pending owner

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner

pendingOwner().notice: Returns the address of the pending owner
